basics.name: Ryan Kim
basics.summary: Biomedical engineer with a strong focus on mechanical design, prototyping, and hands-on hardware development.

portfolio.name: ParaSwing â€“ Wheelchair-mounted golf swing assist device
portfolio.description: Senior capstone project: designed and built a wheelchair-mounted robotic assist device to help users perform a repeatable golf swing. Responsible for mechanical design, CAD, prototyping, and hardware testing.

portfolio.name: Cable-driven gripper prototype
portfolio.description: Designed a cable-driven, surgical-style gripper using 3D-printed components and tendon routing. Focus on linkage design, actuation, and compact mechanical layout.

portfolio.name: Arduino-based omnidirectional car
portfolio.description: Built a small omnidirectional vehicle using Arduino control, multiple DC/BLDC motors, and a custom chassis. Implemented basic motion control and tested multi-directional movement.

portfolio.name: Desktop face recognition tool
portfolio.description: Implemented a desktop face recognition application in Python using OpenCV and face recognition libraries, with a simple UI for enrolling and recognizing users from a webcam stream.
